definition: parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear

sentences.english: This is all the inborn to destine relative.
sentences.chinese: 这都是先天注定的亲缘。

sentences.english: UPGMA (Un-weighted Pair Group Mathematics Average) clustering analysis displayed the genetic relation among the varieties.
sentences.chinese: UPGMA聚类分析结果揭示了各品种间的亲缘关系。

sentences.english: The research is to clarify the sibship and geographic distribution of Artemisia frigida Populations.
sentences.chinese: 阐明内蒙古冷蒿居群亲缘关系与地理分布的关系。

sentences.english: Whether the Myxomycota are closely related to the Eumycota is doubtful.
sentences.chinese: 粘菌是否与真菌有密切的亲缘关系还没有确定。

sentences.english: Pollen morphology and phylogenetic relationships in the Diapensiaceae.
sentences.chinese: 岩梅科的花粉形态和系统与亲缘关系。

sentences.english: Much has been made of the long historical affinity between the two.
sentences.chinese: 两者之间有漫长的历史亲缘。

sentences.english: Therefore the two species were close in consanguinity.
sentences.chinese: 因此这两个种亲缘上是相近的。

sentences.english: The cluster analysis of varieties revealed the relationships among P. nebrodensis strains.
sentences.chinese: 揭示了白灵侧耳菌株间的亲缘关系。

sentences.english: South American game bird resembling a gallinaceous bird but related to the ratite birds.
sentences.chinese: 南美体重翼小的猎鸟，形似鹌鹑但与平胸鸟有亲缘。

sentences.english: About that of affinity between tonalities in discipline of harmony.
sentences.chinese: 关于和声学学科内调性亲缘关系的汉译词。

sentences.english: Application of RAPD Technique in Genetic Relationship Study of Silk Insect I.
sentences.chinese: RAPD分析在绢丝昆虫亲缘关系研究中的应用I。

sentences.english: On the embryology and relationship of the Cephalotaxaceae and Taxaceae.
sentences.chinese: 三尖杉科与红豆杉科的胚胎学及其亲缘关系的研究。

sentences.english: But the relationships between the five birds and Galerida cristata were all far.
sentences.chinese: 而凤头百灵与这五种百灵的亲缘关系均较远。
第一个答案是亲缘选择。

sentences.english: Zymogram analyses on the relationship of Cucurbita crops.
sentences.chinese: 南瓜属蔬菜作物亲缘关系同工酶分析。

sentences.english: They are all related, so the members of and extended family are called relatives.
sentences.chinese: 大家庭中的成员都相互丛有亲缘关系，所以称为亲戚。

definition: blood is thicker than water/fig. family ties are closer than social relations
six close relatives, namely: father 父[fu4], mother 母[mu3], older brothers 兄[xiong1], younger brothers 弟[di4], wife 妻[qi1], male children 子[zi3]/one's kin
relatives/members of the same family, clan, tribe etc
